name: Umbra (Stefenism)
description:
You are an UMBRA, a shadow creature. You've been locked up getting poked and prodded for "science" for as long as you can remember, But now you're free. Time to make your captors pay.

in shadows:
WSAD to fly, bonk enemies to gobble 'em up

in light:

WSAD to glide

on Ground:

AD to move, space to jump, collide with enemies to grapple, drag them to the shadows to make them pay!

Credits: 

Zack Gilbertson - Art/animation

Dalton Myhr - Programming

Jordan Adamek - Sound design, game design

Stefen Menzel - programming

Section 31 -Tech (http://s31tech.org) - BGM - sewer-nightclub
